item.title: 4Front Ventures Corp 10-K
item.description: 4Front Ventures Corp, which is in the Medicinal Chemicals & Botanical Products [2833] industry, SEC 10-K filing on April 07, 2021 had 40500 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 806 instances cannabis - 456 instances 2020 - 375 instances 31 - 356 instances december - 340 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
